title: Montagna di Gildone
description: A series of noncontinuous fortifications are extant on Mount Gildone (elevation 902 meters) that enclose part of an upland plateau. A nucleus of 23 Samnite tombs was also discovered in the vicinity.

properties.description: Representative location of the mountain peak based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Montagna di Gildone
